subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Auctions
lead_paragraph: The formal title of an event Saturday underscores the harsh truth that, for all its pastoral charms, baseball is a fickle, difficult business: “The Newark Bears Baseball Team Liquidation.”
snippet: The formal title of an event Saturday underscores the harsh truth that, for all its pastoral charms, baseball is a fickle, difficult business: “The Newark Bears Baseball Team Liquidation.”
